name: DAILY CHRISTIAN BIBLE VERSES
author: L.Ch.Rajkumar

sections.description:
Daily Christian Bible Verses for your reading from King James Version BIBLE to get Spiritual Growth for you on ALMIGHTY GOD using your WordPress Website.

Features:
1. Provides a daily random BIBLE VERSE from King James Bible Online Official website.
2. Will have Verse link reference with King James Bible Online website.
3. Can be added as Widget or use shortcode to display the Verses.

Support

  • Available via GMAIL(“l.ch.rajkumar@gmail.com”,”dailychristianbibleverses@gmail.com”) , TWITTER(“@lchrajkumar”,”@DCBibleVerses”) & SKYPE(“rajkumar.lch”)
sections.installation:
1. Gain Access to the plugin by taking membership from http://www.skrilleshopplugin.com/membership/.
  2. Once membership is confirmed, download the plugin & upload it to your site using FTP.
  3. Activate the plugin via WP ADMIN DASHBOARD.
  4. Add shortcode as ‘ [dailychristianbibleverse] ‘ in wordpress post or page.
  5. Add ‘Daily Christian Bible Verse’ widget to Sidebar of your WordPress website.
sections.faq:
• Does this plugin can be tweaked with styles??

Yes, you can. A stylesheet is included in the plugin bundle to make any tweaks of your own.

  • Does this plugin will have any future updates?

Yes, there will be.
